basic.name: Andrew Pritykin
basic.summary: Transforming complex challenges into scalable solutions through innovative technology. Driven by a passion for building high-performing teams and delivering impactful products.

experiences.title: Senior Engineering Manager, Media Performance Development Engineering
experiences.details:
Led the architecture and development of a enterprise-grade hardware and software platform for agnostic OTT remote device control and automation, supporting scripted testing and operational workflows across major streaming services like Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+.

Integrated advanced computer vision into the automation pipeline to enable platform-agnostic test execution and visual Quality of Experience (QoE) validation using high-fidelity UVC video capture. Delivered a vision-based automation driver that standardizes remote interactions across Roku, FireTV, AppleTV, and more, eliminating reliance on native SDKs or platform-specific tools.

Developed a custom large language model (LLM) to auto-generate test plans and validations, embedded into the orchestration layer to enhance test throughput and reproducibility across a broad device fleet.

Oversaw the Certification Management Program for domestic and international partners, ensuring compliance with Disney's standards and seamless integration across multiple platforms.

Championed cross-functional initiatives to scale device automation coverage, unify internal toolchains, and reduce operational friction among partner teams, driving innovation and efficiency across the organization.

experiences.title: Engineering Lead, Video Platform
experiences.details: Oversaw the migration of the MLG video platform to integrate with Blizzard's Live/VOD infrastructure. Led the content distribution strategy for major Esports and Entertainment events, including Overwatch League, Call of Duty World League, and Blizzcon. Enhanced the broadcast pipeline through the implementation of AWS Elemental technologies.

experiences.title: Engineering Lead, Live Video Platform
experiences.details:
Lead the architecture and development of a robust streaming platform for MLG Esport events and content creators. Establish high-quality broadcasts to millions of viewers worldwide, both on-site and remote. Improved platform reliability, scalability and video distribution. Maintained custom hardware encoding solutions for optimal encoding performance and video quality.

Developed automation frameworks for regression testing and CI/CD pipelines. Managed test suites, documented defects, and contributed insights to improve QA and development within an agile team.

experiences.title: Professional Services Engineer
experiences.details: Developed custom web applications and tools for small businesses and startups. Built responsive websites, e-commerce platforms, and content management systems using modern web technologies. Collaborated with clients to understand their requirements and deliver tailored solutions that met their business needs.
